Content: Several programs are underway to enhance the language knowledge of the student monks who are studying at Pirivenas. Steps have been taken to meet the need of English Language teachers needed by the Pirivenas. Measures have been taken to recruit Tamil Language Teachers by paying attention to the requests made by Maha Nayaka Theras on the instructions of Minister Akila Viraj Kariyawasam. As an initial step 50 Tamil Language Teachers will be recruited. The Ministry of Education has been planned to recruit more Tamil Language teachers in future according to the requirements. The Ministry has pointed out that the knowledge of various languages will help to build national and religious reconciliation.
